title: Coinbase CEO Says No Access Block in Nigeria, Platform Operating Normally
description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong has dismissed reports of his cryptocurrency exchange being blocked by Nigerian authorities. He emphasized that Coinbase products are fully operational in Nigeria without any interruptions. “We have not received any outreach or communication from officials in Nigeria,” the Coinbase executive affirmed. Meanwhile, Binance has reportedly admitted that some users in Nigeria […]

title: Retik Finance (RETIK) raises $32 Million without Breaking a sweat, Presale Sold Out months before anyone Expected
description: In a resounding testament to the growing prominence of decentralised finance (DeFi) platforms, Retik Finance (RETIK) has achieved a remarkable milestone by raising $32 million in its presale phase, all while seemingly gliding through the process effortlessly. What’s even more impressive is that the presale sold out months before many industry insiders had anticipated, underscoring […]

title: NYU Engineer Leads Effort to Enhance Mass Transit Access for the Visually Impaired
description: In a groundbreaking initiative aimed at revolutionizing mass transit access and overall accessibility, John R. Rizzo, a legally blind principal investigator at NYU School of Engineering, spearheads an endeavor to construct a portable backpack facilitating navigation for the visually impaired within mass transit systems. Bolstered by a substantial $5 million grant from the National Science […]

title: Is Kelexo (KLXO) about to change the way we lend & borrow online? Stacks (STX) & LEO Coin (LEO) see upward spike
description:
The traditional banking system with its many regulations and centralized control has long been the primary avenue for borrowing and lending. However, the system’s inherent flaws, such as high fees, lengthy processes and exclusionary practices, have left many individuals and businesses underserved. As the world becomes increasingly digitized and decentralized, a new paradigm is emerging. […]

title: Why MetaClip (MCLP) unifies investors over Binance as Ripple (XRP) & Cardano (ADA) rift continues
description:
Amid the current changes in Ripple (XRP) and Cardano (ADA) markets, MetaClip (MCLP) stands out as a connecting element, introducing a new way of decentralized trading.
